body_html:
Btw, after you change the newIndices and newValues, please add some reasoning about the change in the PR's description. This is a change in behavior (albeit a rarely used behavior), so it would be useful in future for people who come to this PR for these methods.

It will also partially solve #4994 , but I don't think that should be closed unless sparse tensors are moved into ATen completely.

body:
Btw, after you change the `newIndices` and `newValues`, please add some reasoning about the change in the PR's description. This is a change in behavior (albeit a rarely used behavior), so it would be useful in future for people who come to this PR for these methods. 

It will also partially solve #4994 , but I don't think that should be closed unless sparse tensors are moved into ATen completely.
